tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-45 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (exempt to second reshuffle)
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Was the medalist at PGA TOUR Canada - Mackenzie Tour's Florida Q-School, with a 25-under 263, shooting rounds of 68-66-64-65...Carded his first career top-10 on the Mackenzie Tour at the season-opening PC Financial Open (T10)...Birdied four of the first five holes Friday at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open en route to a three-shot victory and his first win...Held the lead on the back nine at The Great Waterway Classic before settling for a T2 finish.. Ended the season sixth on the Order of Merit to earn an exemption into the final stage of the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament.

2013: Played in eight PGA TOUR Canada events...Made five cuts and had three top-25s, ending the season with his top two finishes, a T13 at the Cape Breton Classic and T17 at the Tour Championship Canada...Was 52nd on the Order of Merit...Played in the RBC Canadian Open for a third consecutive year, missing the cut...Missed the cut at the Mylan Classic in his Web.com Tour debut.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2010 Canadian Amateur and was named ACC Player of the Year in 2013...Won five times in the 2012-13 season and nine times overall playing for North Carolina State...Earned Second Team All-America honors in 2013 and Honorable Mention in both 2012 and 2011...Made the cut at the 2012 RBC Canadian Open, opening 69-68 at Hamilton G&CC. Finished with a pair of 72s to T73...Made his PGA TOUR debut, earning an invitation to the 2011 RBC Canadian Open, where he missed the cut (74-72).
tourBios.personal: Attended Northview Height Secondary in Toronto...Earliest golf memory was a hole-in-one in 2009...Would like to play Augusta National some day...Dream foursome would include his dad, Tiger Woods and Fred Couples...Twitter name is @albinchoi.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2015 at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open presented by Times Colonist.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 19th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
